column3:
comment:"This might be my last buy on daraz.Enough is enough.
Received the parcel.Apart from good packing.
There were some scratches on machine.There is a big scratch (dent) inside washing tub. The machine timer buzzer doesn't work. The warranty starts from 03 sep instead of date of purchase. The dawlance claim ROM of 1300 while 7.5kg Haier machine is about 1000RPM still it runs slower than Haier. The timer descriptions are half removed.
I feel we always get B grade stuff on daraz.
I know there might be some return policy but why do I receive the order which needs to be returned."}
column6: comment:"original 100% good quality and the colour is White  \nreally I loved the product"}
column9: comment:"paking is good nice and savely arive at home delivery man very coprative all is good thanks to darazz .."}

column15: comment:"Received timely with nice packing. now unbox it. found it ok.Will write review once used it. thanx Daraz and dawlance team."}
column18: comment:"Received the product in good and safe packing. There isnâ€™t any minor or major dent or scratches over the surface of washing machine. It also works awesome after being operated.\nThe only bad thing is i received like other buyers a warranty card which isnâ€™t properly stamped and signed neither date of selling was mentioned over it. Asked them in chat window before shipment to make sure this but they refused and said e-invoice is our warranty card whereas there is also not mentioned that this item has 10 years warranty whereas I requested them again by emailing them. Delivery was through tcs and took 2500 amount whereas there is another seller from Karachi who is taking 1500 for delivery with them same price of 21000 washing machine. I suggest you all that seller because of 1000 discount in shipment. TCS staff also kept the machine with themselves for 2 days and didnâ€™t informed me or called me that your item has been arrived
column19: TCS staff was rated third class."}
column22: comment:"MashaAllah very nice washing and also spinner...!\nThanks \nDawlance
column23: Thanks Daraz for great service and also tcs for rush deliver...!\nat the end i must have to say \" Dawlance reliable hai\"...!"}
column26: comment:"I am satisfied but warranty is 10 month not 1 year"}
column29: comment:"best quality as per expectation. i prefered to buy expensive items from daraz mall and always received original product with safe delivery. thanks daraz and dawlance"}
